EmailTemplate.description: Email to participants of SC with info and links to partner products
EmailTemplate.name: StarterCompany_PartnerProductsEmail
EmailTemplate.subject: Digital Main Street - Additional Starter Company Resources
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good afternoon {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations on finishing the DMS Starter Company Plus program. As you begin working on / finishing your Digital Transformation Plan, I wanted to provide you with some additional resources as well as links to all of our partner offers and services.
https://www.dropbox.com/s/3scr9pn5jpjmu4v/DMS%20Starter%20Company%20Additional%20Resources_%286Nov17%29.pdf?dl=0
If you have any questions about any of the partners products or offers, please contact me directly and I will be happy to help you out!
Best of luck with your digital transformation.
-Darryl
